title: Bug 18705 - Too much flashing in Control Example
description: There is excessive flashing in the Control Example.
OB: When resizing the window in the vertical direction only, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: The tabs in the TabFolder and Frames should not flash when resizing the window in the vertical direction only.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Run the Control Example. 2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only. 3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and Frames flash.
